original_text: But an evil spirit from the Lord came on Saul as he was sitting in his house with his spear in his hand. While David was playing the lyre,
korean_text: 사울이 손에 단창을 가지고 그의 집에 앉았을 때에 여호와께서 부리시는 악령이 사울에게 접하였으므로 다윗이 손으로 수금을 탈 때에

sentences.original_text: But an evil spirit from the Lord
as he was sitting in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 집에 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: with his spear in his hand
While David was playing the lyre
